duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain high-quality Android applications using Android SDK and various versions of Android.
Implement cloud message APIs and push notifications for seamless communication within the applications.
Utilize RESTful and GraphQL APIs to enhance application functionality and user experience.
Work with Git and continuous integration tools to manage codebase and deployment process.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment to drive innovation and deliver cutting-edge technological solutions.
Stay updated with the latest technological developments and integrate them into the software development process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
